mapper.select:
select
from questionnaire
AND user_name like "%" #{name} "%"
and create_time >= str_to_date(#{startTime},'%Y-%m-%d')
and create_time <= DATE_ADD(str_to_date(#{endTime},'%Y-%m-%d'),INTERVAL 1 DAY)
order by create_time desc
